Hebrew nouns.text: Hebrew has various types of nouns. Hebrew nouns
by default have an indefinite article

tokens.text: by default have an indefinite article

Hebrew nouns.targetSubtopic: By default have an indefinite article

Hebrew nouns.text: , or they can have a hay ha’yedia, which is the definite article.

By default have an indefinite article.text: The Hebrew word איש, for example, means “a man”, not just “man” and there is no specific word in Hebrew for “a”.
